html:
3.11.19  9:22 pm   YOOOO that scary pockets arrangement was fuckin fire!!!!! i'll be trying to catch them on tour for sure. do you know which genius was responsible for it (the arrangement not the tour)?

      also, what a brilliant job you did on the drums. so slinky and perfect. i know in the past you've said you 9nly have time to make your own content, etc. so can you tell us a bit abt what motivated you to join forces with the band for that one performance?

3.11.19  8:54 pm   favorite toto moment (the band, not the dog)

this

3.11.19  8:33 pm   What kind of music do you listen to?

      And should I start my sentences when I talk with friends with lowercase or uppercase letters?
3.11.19  8:28 pm   can you be born again? if possible, would you do it in russia?
3.11.19  8:19 pm   bill it's time for real drums in your music

3.11.19  6:33 pm   So here's my problem. I really, really, want to start creating things. I have all the ideas, I have the motivation, but there's just so much I want to do that I can't find where to start.

      I just don't really know how to convert all these ideas into the earthly realm, if that makes any sense. I think it might be a problem with finding the right medium? Pls help
3.11.19  6:28 pm   do you have a certain drum groove you like that you can play all day
3.11.19  5:05 pm   Can we expect more collaborations like the one with scary pockets? Maybe opening up the door for the Bill Wurtz "real" big band?
3.11.19  4:37 pm   bill, when i'm playing a melody on my keyboard that has a lot of big leaps, how do i get to decide on the proper fingering so that my hands don't move awkwardly
3.11.19  4:27 pm   do you have faith in humanity?

april 4, 1964
3.11.19  7:29 am   what's the last thing you spent money on?

3.10.19  11:36 pm   Hi, Bill. Asked a question recently cuz I'm a big fan and wanted to see if you would respond. How do I get started making music in your style? I want to make electronic music in the style of infected mushroom but also make jingles like you. Could you give me some tips?
3.10.19  11:04 pm   How long does an average 2-3 minute so g take you to write, record, and mix?

3.10.19  10:37 pm   when should we expect you to go on tour

      and will you have musicians playing with you
3.10.19  9:02 pm   HEY BILL can you order some pizza
3.10.19  8:56 pm   How to form my own country?
3.10.19  8:41 pm   I'm sure you've been asked this, so sorry I couldn't find the answer: when is time?

3.10.19  8:14 pm   When you write a melody, how much though goes into the rhythm of it?

      Do you just go by the flow of the lyrics?

3.10.19  12:21 pm   wait so u release reality vids every week now?
3.10.19  10:19 am   will the new song be super epic

3.10.19  10:17 am   I am exhausted and have to take a break. But I still haven't accomplished nearly as much as I need to. My rate is too slow. But if I don't take a break, my productivity is going to get even worse, so I need to take a day. But I don't think I can really relax and enjoy it, because of the stuff I just mentioned.

3.10.19  1:18 am   do you collect stuff and what do you collect (I collect antiques)

3.10.19  1:10 am   What is the easiest way for me to figure out which reality videos are new/I haven't seen yet? I want to watch the new ones you are uploading, but I definitely do not want to click through every single video to find out which ones are new.
3.9.19  11:42 pm   do longer questions make you feel more inclined to give shorter answers?
